The statement attributed to Michigan Gov: Gretchen Whitmer: The claim includes a specific quote allegedly made by Whitmer, stating, "I will not certify the vote in my state for Donald Trump, no matter the outcome."
Spokesperson denial: Chelsea Lewis, a spokesperson for Whitmer, denied that the governor made this statement, indicating that it is not authentic.
Lack of evidence: The fact-checking investigation found no evidence to support the claim that Whitmer made the statement in question.
Other fact: checking sources: Multiple fact-checking sites, including Lead Stories, concluded that Whitmer did not say the quoted statement. This further supports the authenticity of the claim being false.
